pativedha：The first of these 3 fundamental terms，especially in this 3-fold grouping，belongs to the commentarial literature，though the idea expressed thereby is often found in the suttas in such expressions as：' dhammaṃ pariyāpunāti suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaranaṃ ．．．． ' The 2 other terms are found separately in the suttas．

pativedha：ပတိ-ဝေဓ （ပ） （ပတိ√ဝိဓ်+ဏ）
ထိုးထွင်း၍ သိခြင်း။
